page.title: 16RELIGION
page.content: There are no churches within this area and local churchgoers attend {Inverkeithny Parish Church}which lies 2 miles to the north. The{minister}is the{Rev. Collier.}He also serves two other parishes at {Forgue}and{Largue. The majority of people in the area belong to the{Church of Scotland. There are also 9{Catholics}and 10 {Jehovah Witnesses.}The catholics attend church in{Banff}or{Turriff. The{Jehovah Witnesses}go to{Huntly. The church is an important aspect of life to many people. Recently a fundraising drive raised several thousand pounds for church {restoration.
